00029 /*
00030  * The type of answers to get from a Proximity Search.
00031  * More precisely the type of Reply packet Search Module sends.
00032  * \begin{itemize}
00033  *    \item PROXIMITY_SEARCH_ITEMS_NUMBERS The reply is a 
00034  *          ProximitySearchReplyPacket with the items as numbers.
00035  *    \item PROXIMITY_SEARCH_ITEMS_MATCHES The reply is a 
00036  *          VanillaSearchReplyPacket with the items as VanillaMatches.
00037  * \end{itemize}
00038  * 
00039  */
00040 enum proximitySearchItemsType {
00041    PROXIMITY_SEARCH_ITEMS_NUMBERS = 1,
00042    PROXIMITY_SEARCH_ITEMS_MATCHES = 2,
00043 };
00044 
00045 
00046 /*
00047  * The content of a Position request packet can be.
00048  */
00049 enum PositionRequestPacketContent {
00050    COVEREDIDSREQUEST_CONTENT_ITEMID  = 1,
00051    COVEREDIDSREQUEST_CONTENT_LAT_LON = 2,
00052    COVEREDIDSREQUEST_CONTENT_INVALID = 3,
00053 };
